4219703a-2cc9-43cf-9a2c-2773b0c8e76c.name: 战斗反射
4219703a-2cc9-43cf-9a2c-2773b0c8e76c.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

8762d24f-b305-48b6-84c5-36fd08f55567.name: 健康
8762d24f-b305-48b6-84c5-36fd08f55567.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

2de3f9ad-154b-47cc-b2d2-6fc83f8a3037.name: Fit, Very
2de3f9ad-154b-47cc-b2d2-6fc83f8a3037.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

8d68d155-d76a-462b-a4db-213407e9e6bd.name: 高痛阈
8d68d155-d76a-462b-a4db-213407e9e6bd.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

731b7e19-eace-4bb6-8d1a-f502942c6c25.name: 幸运
731b7e19-eace-4bb6-8d1a-f502942c6c25.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次
